function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Restrictions and limitations on mobility and social activities","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Local responses to a global pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic of covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exploitative rental practices by landlords","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social inequality in the housing market","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of disadvantaged people from social housing","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline of public housing accessibility in sweden","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatisation of social housing in ireland","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global pandemic impact on social housing","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in public investment in decommodified housing","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privatization of social housing units","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatization of public housing and social housing residents in the media and public life","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linking public housing to highly publicized covid-19 'cruise ship' cases","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of public housing lockdown as a 'detainment' rather than a public health measure","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate resources and support for public housing residents during lockdown","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatization of public and social housing residents","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical dilemmas in public decision-making that conflict with public values in the context of managing water systems","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tradeoff between public health and economic preservation in pandemic policymaking","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouragement of remote working and digital twins may lead to reduced physical interaction, impacting social and professional dynamics.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital platforms for utility operations may result in data security and privacy risks.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relaxing environmental regulations to mitigate economic crisis","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of commercial and industrial activity leading to changes in water discharges","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased digitalization in the water sector due to the pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transformation toward digitalization altering the water-human-data nexus","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unique opportunity to develop the water sector and catalyze key preparation for combating climate change","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data mining from sewers through digitalisation","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring public health measures in sewers","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexible approach in implementing measures for different building typologies and purposes","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for more research in developing effective win-win solutions for resilience and sustainability","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic outbreak creates economic crisis and major social implications, leading to potential health risks and impacts on the built environment.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative social and economic impact of social confinement measures","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced funding for sustainable development goals due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on private vehicle travel over public transport due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on covid-19 risk reduction measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to integrate sustainability into covid-19 risk reduction measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of investment for virus and infectious disease detection systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential challenge to privacy due to software applications for risk identification","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of road width for wider pedestrian paths","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Distribution of public disinfectant containers or washing infrastructures","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"New pop-up service points for bicycle repairs and free water","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with the potential failure of solutions to reduce covid-19 risks over time","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of inadequate solutions leading to ongoing covid-19 transmission","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of overlooking broader sustainability in the pursuit of covid-19 risk reduction","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on built environment in covid-19 research","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on the built environment in covid-19 research and publications, with less than 1% of articles addressing the impact on buildings and built environments.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of infectious diseases like covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear efficacy of protection against re-infections in people with and without symptoms at their initial sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulating evidence on the efficacy and duration of natural immunity contributing to the mitigation of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete vaccination data due to vaccinations taking place outside of the health system","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower testing frequency in previously sars-cov-2 infected participants versus the control group","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"}]}
